name: Layerup
headline: AI Agents for Banks and Credit Unions
description: Layerup's mission is to boost innovation in industries that lack it, starting by bringing AI securely to enterprises.

founders.name: Arnav Bathla, Founder
founders.description:
Shipping products since 13. Got invited by NASA Ames research center and NSS for a spacetech idea at 15 -- shipped a habitable space settlement proposal (as a part of a contest), built a team, and got 3rd prize globally. Fell in love with tech, solving *big* problems and startups ever since:)

On a mission to build the biggest company now!

Get a demo 
# Human-like voice AI for financial institutions.
Forward-thinking financial institutions use Layerup's compliant AI Agents to provide 24/7 support, reduce delinquencies, increase collections rate, and increase loan volume.
Get a demo
![shape](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fshape%2Fshape-01.png&w=96&q=75)![shape](https://www.uselayerup.com/images/shape/shape-02.svg)![shape](https://www.uselayerup.com/images/shape/shape-03.svg)
![Hero](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhero%2Fhero-light.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Client](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbrand%2Fbrand-light-01.png&w=384&q=75)![Client](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbrand%2Fbrand-light-02.png&w=384&q=75)![Client](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fbrand%2Fbrand-light-03.png&w=384&q=75)
Voice AI Demo
## Like a real human, but better
Emotionally intelligent, factually accurate, and always available.
MaleEnglishSouthern Accent
30+ Languages
## AI Agents Work 24/7 via Phone, Text, and Email
Layerup's AI Agents streamline your lending lifecycle, managing onboarding to collections with seamless multi-channel support and smart escalation.
### Phone
Our conversational voice AI agents are indistinguishable from humans, equipped with emotion, empathy, and the ability to engage naturally.
### Text
Reach lendees with personalized and customized messages through any text platform, including RCS, SMS, WhatsApp, and more.
### Email
Rely on personalized, customized emails that are sent in conjunction with our other channels, ensuring a cohesive communication strategy.
24/7 AI Call Center
## Specialized Modules Tailored for Financial Institutions
Explore our suite of AI-driven modules designed to enhance operational efficiency and customer engagement in the financial sector.
### Voice AI for Collections
Streamline your collections process with intelligent, human-like AI interactions.
### Intelligent Payment Reminders
Proactively reduce delinquencies with personalized, automated reminders.
### Loan Servicing Voice AI
Keep borrowers informed with timely updates on their loan status and account changes.
### 24/7 Inquiry & Support for Financial Services
Provide expert-level assistance for complex financial products with AI-driven solutions purpose-built for financial services companies. Enhance customer experience and reduce resolution time.
### Sales & Churned Applicant Follow-Up
Re-engage and convert potential borrowers with proactive, personalized outreach tailored to their needs. Drive sales growth by turning churned leads into loyal customers.
### And more...
Get in touch to learn what other AI modules might be applicable for your financial institution.
#### Empower decisions with analytics
## Stay in the loop with extensive analytics
Each AI agent provides detailed analytics on its specific operations, while also contributing to a comprehensive overview of all compliance activities, enhancing decision-making and transparency.
![About](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fabout%2Fabout-light-02.png&w=3840&q=75)
![About](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fabout%2Fabout-light-01.png&w=3840&q=75)![About](https://www.uselayerup.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fabout%2Fabout-dark-01.png&w=3840&q=75)
AI Agents Trust and verify
## Perfect visibility and control
Own your data with zero data retention. Get role-based permissions and least-privilege access for granular control and insight into product usage with user & agent activity reports.
01
### Role-Based Permissions
Provide users with role-based access to essential data to ensure security.
02
### User & Agent Activity Reports
Monitor user & agent interactions through detailed activity reports for valuable insights.
Features| AI| BPO| In-house  
---|---|---|---  
30+ languages  
50+ accents  
Gender-based voice options  
24/7 availability  
Adaptive conversational tone  
Automated call scheduling and reminders  
Real-time sentiment analysis  
Dynamic script optimization  
Multichannel support (phone, email, SMS, WhatsApp, etc.)  
Unlimited scalability during peak periods  
Instant onboarding and deployment  
Advanced data analytics and reporting  
Automated compliance checks  
No overhead for training or office space  
Built-in regulatory compliance  
Comprehensive audit trail  
Machine learning for better predictions  
Integration with CRMs and ERPs  
Cultural sensitivity training for AI  
Ability to remember previous interactions  
![Dotted Shape](https://www.uselayerup.com/images/shape/shape-dotted-light.svg)![Dotted Shape](https://www.uselayerup.com/images/shape/shape-dotted-dark.svg)
01
Secure by Design
02
Privacy First
03
Cutting Edge AI Partner
## AI Agents built with security in mind.
Security is a top priority, and we ensure that customer data is not used for model training. 
We have strict measures in place to protect data privacy, adhering to industry standards and best practices to safeguard all information shared with us.
## Best privacy practices, ingrained in our DNA.
Privacy is fundamental to our approach, and we are committed to safeguarding personal data.
We do not collect or store unnecessary information, and we employ robust security practices to ensure that customer data remains protected and confidential.
## Your AI partner for collections.
We are at the forefront of innovation, consistently delivering cutting-edge AI solutions to ensure you stay ahead of the curve.
As your forward-thinking and dedicated partner, we are fully committed to driving your success in the fast-paced and ever-evolving world of AI.
Integrations
## AI that understands you.
Layerup AI Agents have access to and make decisions based on your company's integrations, just like a normal analyst would.

generated_description:
**Layerup: Revolutionizing Financial Communication with AI**

Layerup, founded in 2021 and nestled in the innovation-friendly environment of San Francisco, is on a mission to infuse artificial intelligence into the banking sector. Specifically designed for banks and credit unions, Layerup delivers AI agents that provide 24/7 support, optimizing operations and enhancing customer engagement without compromising on compliance.

This promising startup emerged from Y Combinator’s S22 batch, a testament to its potential. With a compact team of only three dedicated employees, Layerup is making waves, driven by the vision to bridge the innovation gap in sectors that often lag behind.

### What Does Layerup Offer?

Layerup's suite of AI solutions is tailored for the unique needs of financial institutions. Imagine a system where AI agents manage the entire lending lifecycle—from onboarding to collections—communicating seamlessly via phone, text, and email. These are not your run-of-the-mill bots; they’re designed to sound human, displaying emotional intelligence and contextual understanding.

Here are some notable features:
- **Voice AI for Collections:** Streamlines the collections process with intelligent interactions that feel personal.
- **Intelligent Payment Reminders:** Sends automated, custom reminders to borrowers, proactively reducing delinquencies.
- **Loan Servicing Updates:** Keeps borrowers informed about their loan status and account changes via a friendly AI interface.
- **Sales and Follow-Up Tasks:** Aims to convert leads and recover churned applicants with targeted outreach.

### Security and Compliance

In an age where data breaches are a constant threat, Layerup prioritizes security and privacy. They have a strict policy of zero data retention, ensuring that customer information is only used for immediate needs without being stored unnecessarily. Access is tightly controlled through role-based permissions, providing peace of mind for financial institutions navigating the complexities of data compliance.

### The Layerup Advantage

Layerup is not just about automated responses; it’s about creating a cohesive customer experience. With the ability to handle communication across multiple channels— phone, text, and email—it enhances borrower satisfaction and boosts collections rates. This innovative approach might just be what traditional banking needs to keep pace with the likes of tech-savvy payment platforms.

With big plans ahead and an eye on expanding their AI capabilities, Layerup is positioning itself as a pivotal player in the fintech landscape.

**For more insights on Layerup and to explore their offerings**, check out their website at [Layerup](https://www.uselayerup.com/). If you’re in the financial sector and seeking a forward-thinking partner to scale your operations, layering AI into your processes might just be the game-changer you need.

In short, Layerup is not merely another fintech company; it's a potential catalyst for transformation within the financial services industry.
